name: Big Flappa and the Vaporization Station
name_original: Big Flappa and the Vaporization Station
description:
Big Flappa and the Vaporization Station is a game where you play as a water-based penguin who needs to escape the vaporization station. You’ll need to utilize the three forms of water to traverse the station and make it to the exit.

“You’re a penguin made of water and you can transition into the three different forms of water! If you’re in water (default) form, step on a burner to turn into gas form so you can fly. Watch out for fans though, they’ll blow you away and disperse you! If you’re in water form and go into a freezer box, you’ll become ice form. This form can break walls but cannot jump, so keep that in mind! Going onto a burner as ice form will turn you into water form, and going into a freezer box as gas form will turn you into water form as well. Watch out for spikes too, they’ll kill you no matter what form you’re in!”

Controls: Arrow Keys to move; Spacebar to jump

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Game Credits:

Bryan Ambriz: Programmer

Everette Webber: Programmer

Yasmine Lee: Artist

Kendrick Haskins: Composer and Sound Designer
